title: Superhero Stenchfest
description: This book contains Emergency Jesus Tampons, a novella by Jason Rogers, and Baby In A Blender, a collection of short stories by David L Tamarin. Bizarre and Extreme Horror, Absurdism, Humor, Satire, Subversive Politics, Gore, Erotica, Metafiction and more all coalesce to create a unique vision and entertaining read. This is one book that you will not be able to forget. It will evoke all types of emotions from horror to empathy, anger to humor and more. Elizabeth Massie has called Tamarin "the rising star of horrific humor."
author: Jason Rogers
